channel.title: Web Designers Guide: "How To Design Web 2.0 Style"
channel.description:
This is a pretty awesome guide, especialy for newbies like myself -- I found it off of Tizag forum.
[center][url=http://webdesignfromscratch.com/web-2.0-design-style-guide.php#simplicity]How To Design Web 2.0 Style[/url][/center]
